Stamatović: Čajetina 2020. počinje izgradnju još jedne gondole, od Ribničkog jezera do Čigote!

04 Nov 2019, 15:00

Osim izgradnje najduže panoramske gondole na svetu, zlatiborske "Gold gondole" duge 9 km koja će biti završena do kraja godine, opština Čajetina namerava da realizuje još jedan veliki infrastrukturni projekat na Zlatiboru i sagradi i drugu trasu gondole koja bi povezivala Ribničko jezero i vrh Čigote, najavio je Milan Stamatović, predsednik opštine Čajetina.Cilj izgradnje gondole je da se rastereti Tornik, a jedan krak gondole, od medjustanice u Ribnici, preusmeri do Čigote, kako bi i taj deo Zlatibora razvio sve svoje turističke potencijale i privukao rekreativce, ljubitelje prirode i adrenalinskih sportova, tokom cele godine rekao je StamatovićOn je objasnio da će gondola od Ribnice do vrha Čigote biti duga oko 4,5 kilometara, a stručnjaci  rade na odabiru najbolje trase.Stamatović očekuje da će u naredne dve godine opština Čajetina završiti ovaj projekat po fazama i tako kompleks Čigote staviti u funkciju i zaokružiti turističku ponudu na nivou celog Zlatibora. Opština će, kako je dodao, planirati sredstva u budžetu za 2020. godinu za početne radove, a nada se da će uspeti da dobije novac i od Vlade Republike Srbije jer je, istakao je Stamatović, reč o opštem interesu.

Stamatovic: Cajetina 2020 begins the construction of another gondola, from Ribnica Lake to Čigota!

04 Nov 2019, 15:00

In addition to the construction of the longest panoramic gondola in the world, the 9 km long Zlatibor Gold Gondola, which will be completed by the end of the year, the Municipality of Čajetina intends to implement another major infrastructure project on Zlatibor and to build another gondola route that would connect Ribnica Lake and the top of Čigota , announced Milan Stamatovic, Mayor of Cajetina Municipality. The goal of the gondola is to unburden Tornik, and to divert one of the gondolas from Ribnica Intersection to Čigota, so that that part of Zlatibor can develop all its tourism potential and attract nature lovers and adrenaline sports, Stamatovic said throughout the year.He explained that the gondola from Ribnica to the top of Čigota will be about 4.5 kilometers long, and experts are working on choosing the best route.Samatović expects that the Čajetina municipality will finish this project in the next two years. phases and thus put the Cigota complex in operation and complete the tourist offer at the level of the whole of Golden wrinkles. The municipality, he added, will plan funds in the budget for 2020 for initial work, and hopes that he will be able to get money from the Government of the Republic of Serbia as, he said, it is a matter of general interest.
